title: alaivEnO nAn ulaga
sahitya:
alaivEnO nAn ulaga inbangaL tEDi anudinam unnai pADi kaLittiDAd-


anupallavi

  malai peyarttu mAri kArtta mAdhavanE malaindE ijjaga mAyaigaLil mayangiyE


caraNam    nilaiyAi unnai ninandE nittam unnai tudittu teLindu varam arindE inba nilai peravE
aridAm undan nAmam onrE tuNai enrariyAdu agham uzhanrE amaidi perAdu nAn
